Open public workshop to view budget proposal for fiscal year 2026. Will be held before the regular council meeting on November 19, 2025 @ 6:00

: Adoption of the 2025-2045 Growth Management Plan. City of Mossyrock Planning Commission is holding a public workshop on December 8, 2025, at 5:00 pm at the City Hall Community Center, Main Street, Mossyrock WA 98564. Public hearing will take place on the same day at 6:00 pm following the Planning Commission regular scheduled meeting.

City of Mossyrock City Council will hold a Public Hearing for the adoption of the 2025-2045 Growth Management Plan on December 17, 2025, at 5:30 pm, prior to the regularly scheduled City Council meeting at the City Hall Community Center, Main Street, Mossyrock WA 98564.

All Mossyrock Council meetings are set for the 3rd Wednesday of each month at the Mossyrock Community Center.

If you would like to be placed on the agenda for a Council Meeting, please contact:

Mayor Randall Sasser by e-mail: mayor@cityofmosssyrock.com or City Treasurer by email: treasurer@cityofmossyrock.com listing your name, the date you would like to be placed on the agenda, and the reason for the request. Requests must be at least 1 week in advance of the council meeting.

The City uses the Mayor/Council form of government. The Mayor is the administrator while the Council legislates, decides the budget with the Mayor’s and Treasurer’s input, and votes on all significant expenditures.

The monthly Council Meeting is the forum for updates on City actions, citizen input, Planning Commission recommendations, and Council deliberation. The Mayor and Council serve elected four-year terms and are nominally paid for the Council Meeting.

Planning Commission will be holding their meetings on the 2nd Monday of every month from 5:30pm to 6:30pm. Meetings are held at the Mossyrock Community Center  219 E. State St.

Please contact City Hall 360-983-3600  or by email: clerk@cityofmossyrock.com at least 7 days prior to scheduled meeting, if you wish to be added to the agenda.

Inquire within Mossyrock City Hall or call for more information @ 360.983.3300

clerk@cityofmossyrock.com
